name: Sanguine Knight
entries: Parting a fine red mist walks a warrior on coated in crimson. Blood drips from their blade; neither of you are shure if it is a slain enemy or their own. You feel your veins shudder in fear, your heart beats erratically. This warrior cares not for injury, only your complete annihilation.
Sanguine Knights are practitioners of sacrificial bloodletting, using their pain to fuel their strikes. With dark hemomantic magic in their arsenal, every injury is a new ooportunity.
